text_en: According to the portfolio Suleiman uses a loom machine and he has good skills in farming.
text_sw: Marekebisho kwa ajili ya Suleiman ni kufanya kazi shambani.

text_en: The accommodation for Suleiman is to get work in a farm.
text_sw: Suleiman ni hodari katika kufuma Sababu za kuwa Kiziwi Asiyeona.

text_en: The portfolio gives the staff at Sikri a lot of information about Washington.
text_sw: Potifolio huwapatia wafanyakazi walioko Sikri taarifa nyingi kuhusu Washington

text_en: Washington is able to discriminate shapes and forms.
text_sw: Washington anaweza kutofautisha maumbo na sura.

text_en: Learning simple sign language is a goal for Washington.
text_sw: Kujifunza lugha rahisi/nyepesi ya ishara ndilo lengo lake Washington
